title: Classic Outdoor Games
description: Remember playing until the streetlights came on? Test your memory of the outdoor games that kept kids busy for hours!

questions.question: In the game of Kick the Can, what happened when 'It' found another player's hiding spot?
options: The found player had to kick the can
The found player was out of the game
The found player was sent to jail

questions.question: In Red Light, Green Light, what did players have to do when 'It' shouted 'Red Light'?
What did children traditionally use to draw a hopscotch court on the sidewalk?
In the game of Capture the Flag, what was typically used as the 'flag'?
What was the traditional chant used to start a game of Hide and Seek?
options: Come out, come out, wherever you are!
Ready or not, here I come!

questions.question: In the game of Red Rover, what did a player have to do when called over?
options: Run and try to break through the opposing team's linked hands
Throw a ball at the other team

questions.question: What outdoor game involved throwing a rubber ball against a wall while performing tricks like clapping or spinning?
In the game of Mother May I, what happened if a player moved without saying 'Mother May I?'
options: They had to go back to the start

questions.question: What game involved one person being 'It' and tagging others, who then also became 'It' until everyone was caught?
In the game of Sardines, how does it differ from regular Hide and Seek?
options: Everyone hides and one person seeks
One person hides and everyone seeks

questions.question: What classic nighttime outdoor game involved one person with a flashlight trying to spot hidden players?
In the game of Spud, what did players throw at each other after a number was called?
What classic outdoor game required players to leap over each other's backs while they crouched down?
In the game of Four Square, how many players occupied the court at one time?
What classic outdoor game involved tossing horseshoes at a metal stake in the ground?
